webApps.title: Forbidden Ramen
webApps.description: A modern restaurant app with bill splitting and tipping functionality, built with React and modern CSS.

webApps.description: A Go-based web application that allows users to search for news articles using the News API.

webApps.title: Weather App
webApps.description: Real-time global weather updates with a modern UI. Powered by Express, React, and WeatherAPI.

devOpsTools.title: DevKit
devOpsTools.description: A CLI tool that simplifies secure container development by turning complex, multi-step security processes into simple commands. Features include automated vulnerability scanning, security documentation generation, and secure Kubernetes deployments.

devOpsTools.title: CICD Goat
devOpsTools.description: A deliberately vulnerable CI/CD environment for learning CI/CD security through multiple challenges.

learningResources.title: WordsIK (Words I Know) Learn, Play, Know
learningResources.description: A collaborative repository for educational vocabulary, grammar, and spelling resources that can be used to build language learning games and applications. Built with robust quality assurance and multi-language support.

creativeFun.title: Emojinomicon
creativeFun.description: A repository of SVG emoji assets for web projects, from backgrounds to cursors.

codepens.description: A forbidden ramen restaurant with bill splitting and tipping functionality.

codepens.title: Glitches
codepens.description: ChatGPT creepypasta with glitching CSS effects.

codepens.title: Bugs - Match 2 Game
codepens.description: A fun memory matching game with a bug theme.

codepens.title: Isomorphic Room with Trihedral Vertex
codepens.description: An isometric 3D illusion created using CSS, designed to simulate a trihedral vertexâ€”a point where three perpendicular planes meet, forming the corner of a room.

podcasts.description: Come listen to experts in building infrastructure and enabling development and deployment processes discuss the ideas and technologies involved in DevOps. Hosted by Will Button and Warren Parad

podcasts.title: Fork Around And Find Out
podcasts.description: Your downtime from uptime, a chance to learn from expert's successes and failures. Hosted by Justin Garrison and Autom Nash

podcasts.title: Station 151
podcasts.description: A science-fiction podcast written by Andy Scearce and Steven James Scearce. It is produced by Bear Weiter and Pale Matter. Station 151 is Antarctica's first and only astronomical radio observatory.

videoChannels.title: IBM Technology
videoChannels.description: Whether it's AI, automation, cybersecurity, data science, DevOps, quantum computing or anything in between, we provide educational content on the biggest topics in tech.

videoChannels.title: The Coding Train
videoChannels.description: All aboard! The Coding Train is on its way with creative coding video tutorials on subjects ranging from the basics of programming languages like JavaScript to algorithmic art, machine learning, simulation, generative poetry, and more.

videoChannels.title: Kevin Powell
videoChannels.description: Helping you learn how to make the web, and make it look good while you're at it. With weekly videos and shorts, I'll be bringing you How Tos and Tutorials, as well as simple tips and tricks, with a big focus on helping people see how wonderful CSS is!
